newsitem.title: USA: Transcend suit dismissed, appeal planned.
newsitem.headline: Transcend suit dismissed, appeal planned.

text.p: Transcend Services Inc said Monday its lawsuit against 13 workers' compensation insurance carrier groups in California has been dismissed by the Los Angeles Superior Court.
The company said it will appeal the ruling to the California Court of Appeals.
By stipulation, Transcend said, the carriers' cross-complaints against the plaintiffs were stayed pending resolution of the plaintiffs' appeal.
Transcend said it believes the trial court's ruling, if upheld by the appellate court, also would result in dismissal of the cross-complaints.
Transcend is a hospital services company that provides a range of services including case management services to insurance carriers, third party administrators and self-insured employers.
